value.name: Friends, co-workers remember the woman allegedly murdered by a CPD officer
value.description: (WTVM) - After the loss of Kelly Levinsohn, the 44-year-old woman shot ... Levinsohn was shot and killed Saturday night after what Columbus police believe was a domestic dispute.
